carrier_master.driver_satisfaction_notes: Decent pay for mid-size. ESOP = drivers are owners. Equipment quality praised. Flatbed division well-regarded. Some dispatch and home time complaints.
carrier_master.fit_rationale: 1,600 trucks = largest privately held prospect. ESOP = drivers are owners, making Outriders Club a natural extension of ownership culture. Arkansas neighbor. 5,500 trailers = Media Partner goldmine. Strong I-40 corridor presence. $700M revenue but still family-run feel.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: Your drivers are employee-owners. Give them an owner's experience on the road.
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: 5,500 trailers = massive Media Partner Program opportunity — national sponsors could offset membership costs
carrier_master.recommended_entry_persona: VP Operations or Driver Development leadership
carrier_master.exec_summary: Maverick Transportation is a privately held, ESOP-owned carrier based in Harrison, AR with 1,600+ trucks, 5,500 trailers, 2,000 drivers, ~$700M revenue. Founded 1980. Largest privately held prospect in pipeline. ESOP model = drivers are owners. Dry van + flatbed + glass hauling. Arkansas HQ = neighbor. Anchor prospect for entire pipeline strategy.
